name: MARINER 19 FK
notes:
The hull of the MARINER is the same as that of the RHODES 19. A trunk centerboard and fixed keel version have been available for both boats. 
In 1969, a '2+2' version was introduced that has a slightly larger cuddy/cabin.
Another modified version (with different cabin design) called the SPRINDRIFT ONE appeared in 1980 after the original molds were sold to Rebel Industries-(Spindrift One-Designs).(76 built).
In 1986, the licensed builder became Stuart Marine Corp. of Rockland, ME (USA).(Also builder of the RHODES 19).
